author: nicolaken
msg: Removed duplicated copying of files during the creation of the shbat
distro. Now the shbat context dir is like the webapp context dir.
This reduces Forrest build time from 53 to 19 seconds on my system.

author: cheche
msg: Added support for docbook version 4.1.2. Allows importing files

author: nicolaken
msg: Fixed bug in the autodownload support for skins that was preventing
custom skins in the project source dir from working.

author: jefft
msg: file RELEASE-NOTES-0.5.1-RC2.txt was initially added on branch FORREST_05_BRANCH.
